name: poc-flexible-web-application-architecture
description: This project demonstrate a flexible Babel and Webpack based web application architecture.

scripts.build-all: npm run build angular && npm run build angularjs && npm run build  aurelia && npm run build inferno && npm run build preact && npm run build react && npm run build svelte && npm run build vanilla && npm run build vue
scripts.commit: git add . && git commit && git push
scripts.coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha && nyc check-coverage
scripts.update: npm install --no-save && npm update --no-save && npm outdated

hooks.pre-push: lint-staged && npm run test && npm run e2e
